item.title: Tidy Text Mining
item.description: Thanks to the short course at SDSS 2019, I learned how to do tf-idf to topic modeling and sentiment analysis by using tidytext taught by Julia Silge, author of Text Mining with R and Mara Averick. They did a great job on teaching the four hour class. I didnâ€™t expect to have so much covered in the short course. Here is an example that I used the method to analyze A Tale of Two Cities and Great Expectations by Charles Dickens by using sentiment analysis.
